it.polito.computervision.gestures

Class GestureListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.gestures.GestureListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GestureListener

    public class GestureListenerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements GestureListener
    A convenience class providing an empty implementation of the GestureListener interface.
    Author:
    Giovanni Piumatti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GestureListenerAdapter() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGestureCompleted(GestureData gesture)
      Invoked when the Gesture has completed (i.e. it passed from state IN_PROGESS to state COMPLETED).
      void onGestureInProgress(GestureData gesture)
      Invoked on each frame while the Gesture is in state IN_PROGRESS.
      void onGestureStarted(GestureData gesture)
      Invoked when the Gesture has just started (i.e. it passed from state POSSIBLE_DETECTION to state IN_PROGRESS).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GestureListenerAdapter

        public GestureListenerAdapter()

    • Method Detail

      • onGestureStarted

        public void onGestureStarted(GestureData gesture)
        Invoked when the Gesture has just started (i.e. it passed from state POSSIBLE_DETECTION to state IN_PROGRESS). This callback is invoked only for live gestures.
        Specified by:
        onGestureStarted in interface GestureListener
        Parameters:
        gesture - The data associated to the gesture

      • onGestureInProgress

        public void onGestureInProgress(GestureData gesture)
        Invoked on each frame while the Gesture is in state IN_PROGRESS. This callback is invoked only for live gestures.
        Specified by:
        onGestureInProgress in interface GestureListener
        Parameters:
        gesture - The data associated to the gesture

      • onGestureCompleted

        public void onGestureCompleted(GestureData gesture)
        Invoked when the Gesture has completed (i.e. it passed from state IN_PROGESS to state COMPLETED). This callback is always invoked (i.e. both on live and non-live gestures).
        Specified by:
        onGestureCompleted in interface GestureListener
        Parameters:
        gesture - The data associated to the gesture
